summary: ACBRadio presents...An all in one "Fan-made" Game Of Thrones mod 'GOT - Riverside Cottage'...This mod adds the following...Donker316...Game of Thrones Armor Compilation...P3dr0 aka Issae...GAME OF THRONES - House shields...Naruundi...Game of Thrones Weapon Pack (SO)...And additional content from ACBRadio.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#00ff00]'[/color][color=#ffff00][b]GoT Riverside Cottage[/b][/color][color=#00ff00]'[/color][color=#00ff00] [/color][/size][size=4]by [color=#00ff00][b]ACBRadio[/b][/color]

[color=#00ff00][b]Location[/b][b]:[/b][/color][i] [color=#00ff00]"[/color][/i][b][color=#9900ff][u]North/West of Riften[/u][/color][color=#00ff00]"[/color][/b][i]([/i][b][i]See Images for Ref[/i][/b][i])[/i]

[b][color=#00ff00]What is this mod?[/color][/b]

[i]'GoT Riverside Cottage' is an all-in-one armor, weapon & educational package for the 'Game Of Thrones' fan boy/girl out there.[/i]

[b][color=#00ff00]What dose the mod include?[/color][/b]

[i][b][color=#00ff00]The following mods: [/color][/b][/i]

[i]Game of Thrones Armor Compilation...by 'Donker316'[/i]
[i]GAME OF THRONES - House shields...by 'P3dr0' aka 'Issae'[/i]
[i]Game of Thrones Weapon Pack (SO)...by 'Naruundi'

[/i][i][b][color=#00ff00]Additional content: [/color][/b][/i]

[i]GoT Riverside Cottage...by 'ACBRadio'. [/i]

[b][color=#00ff00]What other mods are required?[/color][/b]

[i]Non...The 'GoT Riverside Cottage' mod already has everything you'll need.

[color=#00ff00][b][u]Text Document (.txt)[/u][/b][/color]

[b][color=#ffff00]"Seven Saviour friend's"[/color][/b]

[color=#ffff00][b]'GOT Riverside Cottage[/b][/color]' - [b]'Skyrim Mod' [/b]by [b]'[color=#00ff00]ACBRadio[/color]'[/b]

[b][color=#00ff00]How to Install[/color]:[/b]

[b]Copy & Past/Move[/b]...

[i][u][color=#00ff00]Meshes[/color][/u][b] (I)[/b]
[/i]
...'GoT_Armor&Wepons_Misc_Meshes' to [color=#00ff00]'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Meshes'[/color]
Copy & Past/Move...[color=#00ff00]'Omegared99' to ''Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Meshes' [/color]
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]Arakh','Needle' & 'series' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Meshes\weapons'[/color]

[u][color=#00ff00]Textures[/color][/u] [b](II)[/b]

Copy & Past/Move...[color=#00ff00]'GoT_Armor&Wepons_Misc_Textures' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures'[/color]
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]interface' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures\interface'[/color]
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]Omegared99' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures\weapons'[/color]
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]ThreeEyedLion_Textures' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures'[/color]
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]weapons' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures\weapons'[/color]

[u].ESP[/u] (III)

Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]GameOfThronesArmors' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/color]'
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]GameofThronesWeaponPack' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/color]'
Copy & Past/Move...'[color=#00ff00]GOT_Armor&Wepons_HouseMod' to 'Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/color]'

[u][b][color=#00ff00]Credits[/color]:[/b][/u]

[color=#00ff00][b]Donker316[/b][/color]...Game of Thrones Armor Compilation...[u]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27301[/u]
[color=#00ff00][b]P3dr0[/b][/color] aka Issae...GAME OF THRONES - House shields...[u]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13663[/u]
[color=#00ff00][b]Naruundi[/b][/color]...Game of Thrones Weapon Pack (SO)...[u]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86744[/u]

[/i]

[youtube]Lw3qKotyXr4[/youtube]


[i]GOT Riverside Cottage - Log:

Added (IX) New Non-Static Banners.
Added (XIII) New Non-Static Banners.
Added (XXI) New Armor & Static Shields.
Added (VIII) New Rugs.
Added (XV) New Books.
Added (II) New GOT Maps.
Added (II) New Consumables.
Added (I) 'Dawn_1H'
Added (I) 'LordPortan_Cape'
Added (I) 'Lord_Portan_NPC'[/i]






[/size]
author: ACBRadio
